plot: A professional killer must make a final hit in an attempt to sever the "bad blood" that threatens his clan. But can his redemption save the lives of those he loves most?
title: Sangre/Blood
plot_es: A professional killer must make a final hit in an attempt to sever the "bad blood" that threatens his clan. But can his redemption save the lives of those he loves most?
plot_en: A professional killer must make a final hit in an attempt to sever the "bad blood" that threatens his clan. But can his redemption save the lives of those he loves most?
